title: MAGA commissars deployed throughout federal agencies
summary: Trump administration deploys young Trump loyalists dubbed "MAGA commissars" throughout federal agencies to monitor compliance with administration directives and screen remaining career staff for political reliability.

sources.title: Loyalty tests and MAGA checks Inside the Trump White House's intense screening of job-seekers
Trump's MAGA-fication of the federal government is starting fast

notes: Unprecedented political monitoring system within federal bureaucracy
